security: Revealing that AMWHIP/1 is traveling to Europe for KUBARK errands could compromise the individual's operational security and the nature of the errands being conducted. Quoting directly: "AMWHIP/1 ARRIVING EUROPE 26 APRIL FOR THREE WEEK'S BUSINESS TRIP, INCLUDING KUBARK ERRANDS PARIS, GENEVA. WILL ARRIVE ROME CIRCA 5 MAY AND CONTACT STATION VIA USUAL CHANNEL TO ASCERTAIN ANY SERVICES ROME MAY WISH."
summary: A CIA message indicates that AMWHIP/1 will be arriving in Europe on April 26 for a three-week business trip, including assignments in Paris and Geneva for KUBARK, and will contact the Rome station around May 5 to determine if any services are needed.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET classified message, dated April 22, 1964, from Director to Rome, relays information that AMWHIP/1 will be in Europe for business, specifically mentioning errands for KUBARK in Paris and Geneva. The message states that AMWHIP/1 is expected to arrive in Europe on April 26 for a three-week trip and will contact the Rome station around May 5 through established channels to ascertain any required support from the Rome station.
title: AMWHIP/1 Europe Trip
